description: The Daphne Martini is a classic cocktail that pairs well with pear&nbsp;vodka. You'll often find it labeled as poire, French for "pear." The fruity spirit complements your favorite gins and curacao to create an elegant blue drink perfect for any time of year!
name: Daphne Martini

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker, pour all the ingredients together.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker, pour all the ingredients together.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill with ice, and shake well.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill with ice, and shake well.

recipeInstructions.name: Add a dash of orange bitters. Serve and enjoy.
recipeInstructions.text: Add a dash of orange bitters. Serve and enjoy.
